Development-Specific Shortcuts

HTML/CSS

| Action | Emmet Abbreviation | |â€”â€”â€“|â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”-| | HTML5 Template | ! + Tab | | Div with class | .classname + Tab | | Div with ID | #idname + Tab | | Nested elements | ul>li*3 + Tab |

Git (Terminal)

| Action | Command | |â€”â€”â€“|â€”â€”â€”| | Status | git status | | Add all | git add . | | Commit | git commit -m "message" | | Push | git push | | Pull | git pull |

Productivity Tips

  1. Practice daily - Use shortcuts consistently
  2. Learn gradually - Master a few at a time
  3. Customize - Set up personal shortcuts
  4. Use consistently - Avoid mixing mouse and keyboard
  5. Share with team - Establish common shortcuts
